website_summaries.verdict: A no frills, affordable option with a traditional design that's powered by a flame. Fun to use, too.
pros: Small and stylish, this is a good option for couples or for one person who loves chocolate or cheese fondue
Wood base adds to its good looks
cons: At only 7 oz., this won't work for more than 2 people
Pot is prone to break if you drop it

customer_reviews.title: really a two-in-one product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this fondue set twice for cheese fondue (worked great at keeping the cheese warm and melted) and more recently, I've been using it for aromatherapy by filling it with water and dropping a few drops of peppermint oil. Light a tea light underneath and voila! Your fondue set is now an essential oil diffuser! A great two-in-one product. I live in a small home, so it's wonderful when items can pull double duty.
customer_reviews.author: KMS832

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty and adorable:) It was a gift for Valentine's and holds just the right amount of chocolate fondue for 2-4 people. I was worried that the little candle couldn't possibly heat it but it actually boiled when not stirred for awhile so I guess it was pretty hot!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this pot work great. it heated the cheese quite a bit so i definitely recommend stirring frequently.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little fondue set.
customer_reviews.text: This is really the perfect little set. No muss, no fuss. Easy to clean, and yes, a tea light is enough to keep cheese and chocolate fondue at the right temperature.
customer_reviews.author: @teresalo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun fondue pot. It looks awesome and is the perfect size for two people who don't plan on stuffing themselves too much.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I rated this once. Zero. So tiny for 29.00 and not at all as it appeared on pocture
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis L. Muller

customer_reviews.title: So cute! A perfect size for date night
customer_reviews.text: This little fondue pot is adorable. It's a great size for two people. I served it on a charcuterie board with a bunch of dippers.
customer_reviews.author: Lucerne07

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun fondu
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute!! I got it as a gift for my boyfriend, who loves fondu. It's perfect for two people and it's pretty too. Add chocolate, fruit, champagne and candles, and you' have a romantic evening. The wood is beautiful with a rich dark color. Really a great little thing.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Received it next day
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Received it next day. In time to have swiss cheese fondue poolside at the El Conquistador resort. I didn't have access to a cook top or microwave and was surprised to find that the single tea candle melted the cheese completely. ( bring an extra candle or two)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert A. Frabotta

customer_reviews.title: Fondue Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this fondue warmer and it works just like it is supposed to. I use it for Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Cherub Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of these. These are good because, unlike one-piece fondue pots, you can easily take the pot off the flame if the food starts to get too hot. The only downside is that they are bigger than I thought, so they're not all that great for making modest amounts, like chocolate fondue for two.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Takes me back to the 60's
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I like and quite concerned about letting the small candle burn without my direct attention and watchfulness.
customer_reviews.author: barb s

customer_reviews.title: Date Night!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is for 2 people only. Add chocolate, wine, and fresh fruit, and your gettin' laid. The forks are sturdy. The base is solid. The ceramic pot cleans with ease.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but the pot cracked the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but the pot cracked the first time I use it after the included candle burned the chocolate on the bottom of the pot . Who wants to be constantly relighting the candle to keep things at the right temperature? I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Erin
